Personal profile            
 
A motivated, adaptable and responsible construction student completed in November 
2015, seeking a position in construction department in which will utilize the 
professional and skills developed through my studies and experience in this field. I am 
focused to work and strong drive to see things through to completion.   
  
Education             
 
2018 – Date: Bachelor’s  Degree in Quantity Survey  
 University College of Estate Management  
                         
2016:           Diploma in Quantity Survey (Private student)  
 
2012-2015: Diploma in Quantity Survey  
                      Kenya Institute of Highway and Building Technology   
 
2008 – 2011: Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education  
                         Malava Boys High School   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Work experience            
January 2016 – April 2016: Sabema International  Ltd 
Position: Road Surveyor Assistant  
Roles  
1. Preparations of valuations  
2. Road survey  
3. Measurement and re -measurement works  
4. Recording and monitor day works  
5. Preparation of pay -roll for employees and site staff  
6. Attending progress meetings  
7. Following up orders made to suppliers  
8. Checking materials delivered to site against orders made  
9. Assisting in overall site administration  
Project.  
1. Kakamega county – Nala road 
 
September 2016 – To date: Nyange Integrated Consultants Ltd  
Position: Quantity Survey Assistant  
Roles  
1. Preparation of Bills of documents  
2. Preparation of Tender documents  
3. Tendering and Quotations  
4. Tender analysis  
5. Interim valuation and Penultimate Valuation preparations.  
6. Appraisal and Final accounts  
7. Preparation of material schedule.  
8. Feasibility studies.  
9. Preparation of programme  of works  
10. Site measurements and remeasurements  
11. Financial Appraisal and report writing  
12. Assessment  of Contractors claims, vari ations, fluctuatiations  
13. Adjustments for Provisional Sums and Prime Costs  
14. Participate in meetings  
15. Preparation of variation orders  Projects:
